page.title: 13Health in West Enfield
page.content: The Enfield Health Authority is planning to up-date its hospital services. To do this it will be fulfilling a new, ambitious plan. The hospital is to cost about twenty million pounds. It will come into service in the 1990's and will be called Enfield District Hospital. This will have many advantages. There will be more modern equiptment, more staff and better conditions for patients and staff. Highlands Hospital will be sold and the money will go towards funding the new Hospital. The older buildings will be demolished at Chase Farm Hospital to make room for new buildings. At Highlands Hospital the views of the staff are all nearly the same. Most people who work at Highlands say that it is quite a good idea to have the new Hospital.
